page.title: 20 Art And Crafts
page.content: Several people in the village are skilled in some craft.Mrs Parslow is a lace_maker.Mrs Hesketh is a smocker as well as sewing and knitting. Mrs Kyle is a spinner and weaver. Mrs Anderson is a potter.Mrs Watson-Gandy is a china painter and Mrs Mitchell is another potter. Mrs Mitchell learnt pottery in Scotland.Then she went to various colleges around the country.Now she goes to Langley college.She works in a studio at home. Her equipment cost about Â£2,000.Mrs Mitchell uses red earthenware,stoneware and porcelain clay for her work.She specializes in thrown work. The processes she has to go through are: (1)prepare the clay; (2) make the object; (3)fire it; (4)glaze (to give a shiny surface); (5)final firing. She makes several hundred objects a year.
